title: [Large-Scale] Language-Based Decision-Making Competency Development Course Through Online Business Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Business Terminology and Intermediate-Level Language Proficiency
context.additional_context: Operated in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing multinational business scenarios in language domain applications.

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform decision-making simulations using advanced business terminology in a BSG environment with over 80% proficiency.
Learners improve and apply language strategies (negotiation, presentation, etc.) at least three times based on simulation feedback.
Learners can use business language expressions with 90% accuracy in interactions with peer learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
